member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Client.Transports.PollingRequestHandler.OnAfterPoll
member.summary: Triggers before a new polling request is attempted. Passes in an exception if the Poll errored, null otherwise. Expects the return as a task in order to allow modification of timing for subsequent polls.
